name: api-check
installCommand: set -e; if [ -f yarn.lock ]; then sed -i "s#https://r.cnpmjs.org#https://registry.npmjs.org#g; s#https://r2.cnpmjs.org#https://registry.npmjs.org#g" yarn.lock; fi; npm config set registry https://registry.npmjs.org; yarn config set registry https://registry.npmjs.org; env -u NPM_CONFIG_REGISTRY -u npm_config_registry -u YARN_REGISTRY -u yarn_registry yarn install --frozen-lockfile --network-timeout 600000 --verbose
